ComicInfo.Title: The Thing from the Sea; A Honeymoon of Horror!; The Stranger in Studio X; Nightmare!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Thing from the Sea: Eddie Murray is killed by Johnny Smithers and pushed overboard at sea. While the killer courts the girl of the deceased, the dead man treads along the bottom of the ocean home to his honey. Eddie finally arrives in New York and drags Johnny into the water, to have some company in death.
A Honeymoon of Horror!: A young newlywed couple is out for a drive when a crash occurs. The bride is killed. The groom, overwrought with grief, makes a deal with a mysterious man to be with his wife again. This stranger, Mr. Prim, is The Devil himself and that the young groom just made a unholy deal which Mr. Prim intends to collect on.
The Stranger in Studio X: A stranger with knowledge of death and disaster before it happens scares Don Creighton into fulfilling his own death announcement.
Nightmare!: Undercover U.S. agent Andriko Banoff thwarts a plan to ship atom bombs from "totalitarian Eastern ports" into US harbors.
ComicInfo.Penciller: Wally Wood,Sid Check,Joe Orlando,Louis Ravielli,Rocco "Rocke" Mastroserio,Manny Stallman,Wally Wood,Sid Check,Joe Orlando,Louis Ravielli,Rocco "Rocke" Mastroserio,Manny Stallman
